title: 300k points in sion, some things need to change.
body:
* His R to Q combo is still wonky as hell. If i recall correctly, it was supposed to be fixed all the way back in patch 5.18. Everytime i ult into someone, Sion just awkwardly stands there and i have to reactivate my Q once again. By this time whoever ive hit has either already flashed out, or has just sidestepped the Q. FIX THIS....
* Thresh's lantern STILL makes Sion's ult redirect if he hits it. Really? I get that Sion is supposedly one of the healthiest champs in the game, but this "counterplay" is just sad and ridiculous. Thresh's lantern is **not** terrain. 
* Not sure if this is a glitch, but if I ult in front of a massive minion wave, the minion wave redirects Sion's ult, literally slamming him into the wall
* Sion's ult hitbox shouldn't be behind him. How can i use his ult as a disengage if whoever is behind me can trigger the knockup and stopme. 
* His W sucks. Short and simple.

Thanks for reading.

A list of simple things to keep in mind when using Sion's W that I posted on a different thread:

Don't be afraid to activate it early... If your thinking of trading or you think they want to then pop it up... Make them think about it... The big red bubble is scary! And if your jungling put your first point into your W like usual and activate it at 1:36 so that you can pop it as soon as you need to (you can basically take 1 hit from the camp before it gets popped at this point).

You can activate your shield while charging your Q and while ulting. Use that to your advantage because they can't pop your shield if they're running/CCed/can't even see you yet (choo choo!).

Your E is your most reliable ability; use it to set up your Q and to keep them off you/slow them down so you can disengage as your shield is charging.

I also pointed out in the same post that a second point in W at lvl 4 is a great idea as it bumps it up a bit in both durability and damage.

I don't care who your opponent is or how good/smart they are... There are ways to get your shield off if you want to get your shield off. Good luck to ya. :3
